name: Lily Lander Winter (C64 DRM Edition)
description:
Do you think you have what it takes to break the strict copy protection of our brand new, winter-themed version of Lily Lander for the C64?

The purchase of this game will allow you to be the exclusive owner of the very first binary copy of Lily Lander Winter!  With it, you apparently receive a license to break the copy protection and distribute the game however you want, just like every other C64 game! 

Just imagine: your name scrolling across the screen as players wait for our game to load, set to the music you want them to hear!  They'll never forget how great a person you were for removing the copy protection from the original game and giving it to the world for free!  You'll be lauded a hero, and will quickly rise the ranks of your favorite cracking community!

This holiday season marks the release of The C64, sure to be a hit with retro-conscious consumers.  Here is your big chance to let them know who is the very best at removing copy protection and distributing someone else's work!

If you want to play THIS EXACT GAME, but without the winter skin, it's available for free at https://turtlepanda.itch.io/lily-lander
